	at magic.model.choice.MagicChoice.getArtificialChoiceResults(MagicChoice.java:90)

	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Using Magarena 1.48

I have tested corruption in another deck, and seems to be working fine - I have a feeling this is an error linked to Marsh Flats - It was activated and successfully used as the crash occured, continuing to the end of the computer's turn in the background while the error window was still open.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: NoSychMethodError

comments.body: Actually, looks like Caribou Range - double coloured mana issue?

comments.body: Nope - no idea what's causing this - sry for spamming
